projects.title: Fake News Detection
projects.shortDescription: A machine learning model using NLP to classify news articles as real or fake.
projects.longDescription: Developed a robust machine learning model leveraging Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques to accurately detect and classify fake news articles.

projects.title: Facial Emotion Recognition
projects.shortDescription: Deep learning system that detects human emotions from live camera feeds.
projects.longDescription: Using CNNs, this system identifies expressions like happiness, sadness, anger, and surprise in real-time.

projects.title: Smart Home Automation
projects.shortDescription: Control appliances via smartphone with real-time feedback.
projects.longDescription: Designed a comprehensive smart home system allowing users to remotely control lights and fans via ESP32.

projects.title: Real-time Chat Application
projects.shortDescription: Modern chat platform with Socket.io for instant messaging.
projects.longDescription: A Slack-like clone with public rooms, private chats, and file sharing.

projects.title: 2D Platformer Game
projects.shortDescription: Side-scrolling platform game with levels and enemies.
projects.longDescription: Developed using Unity and C#, featuring multiple levels and enemy AI.

projects.title: Smart Contract Voting System
projects.shortDescription: Decentralized voting platform using Ethereum smart contracts.
projects.longDescription: Ensures transparency and immutability of votes on blockchain.
